text: @CDCDirector Resign you spineless POS! You're supposed to be saving lives - but you are a ghoul just like #Trump and #Pence. An f'ing mask 'fashion show' when @realDonaldTrump is extorting our schools to open. #MAGA indeed. #NEA #COVID19 #TrumpIsKillingUs
